attributes.action: Stop members of Parliament sleeping whilst in chambers. Instant dismissal.
attributes.additional_details: I see it on television. I hear about it from councillors meetings.
attributes.background:
Why should any member of paliament sleep whilst in chambers get paid? 
Why should councillors be paid when they sometimes turn up towards the end?

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "instant dismissal" or how you would like this to work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for the rules of the House of Commons to be changed, to introduce a penalty for MPs found to be sleeping in the House of Commons Chamber.
